src.datagather.network¶

Classes¶

Network

Abstract base class for all modules that perform some data gathering.

Module Contents¶

class src.datagather.network.Network¶

Bases: src.datagather.datagather.DataGather

Abstract base class for all modules that perform some data gathering.

Methods:

  • gather(): Abstract method to gather data.

  • return_data(): Abstract method to return gathered data.

  • pretty_print(): Abstract method to pretty print the gathered data.

gather()¶

Gather data.

Raises:

  • NotImplementedError: If the method is not implemented in a subclass.

return_data()¶

Return gathered data.

Returns:

  • Any: The gathered data.

Raises:

  • NotImplementedError: If the method is not implemented in a subclass.

pretty_print()¶

Pretty print the gathered data.

Raises:

  • NotImplementedError: If the method is not implemented in a subclass.

tcpdump_thread()¶
classmethod get_path()¶
classmethod get_file_name()¶
extract_dns_requests_for_all_pcaps()¶

Extracts DNS requests from a series of PCAP files and compares them against a ‘noise’ PCAP file to identify unique DNS requests.

Returns:

list: A list of unique DNS requests found in the PCAP files excluding those found in the ‘noise’ PCAP.

classmethod extract_dns_requests_from_pcap(pcap_path)¶

Extracts all requested domain names from a PCAP file.

Parameters:

pcap_path – Path to the PCAP file

Returns:

A set of domain names

extract_target_ips_and_ports_for_all_pcaps()¶

Extracts target IPs and ports from a series of PCAP files and compares them against a ‘noise’ PCAP file to identify unique target IPs and ports.

Returns:

set: A set of unique target IPs and ports found in the PCAP files excluding those found in the ‘noise’ PCAP.

classmethod extract_target_ips_and_ports(pcap_path)¶

Extract all target IPs and ports from a pcap file.

Parameters:

pcap_path – Path to the pcap file

Returns:

A set of target IPs and ports in the format “IP:Port”

count_bytes(ip_address, port, pcap_file)¶
